name: NextTanks (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Action - arcade game for ZX Spectrum Next computer.

Protect the red generator from enemy fire and destroy all the tanks to go to next level. 

Take the objects that some enemies leave when dia, it will give you temporary improvements.

  • 1 or 2 players simultaneous
  • Keyboard and Kempstom support
  • 12 game levels
  • 5 types of enemies
  • 6 kind of extra objects
  • Compatible with 1MB and 2MB ZX Spectrum Next versions

This game was done using:

ZX Basic compiler (https://www.boriel.com/ by José Rodríguez Boriel)

NextBuild (http://zxbasic.uk/nextbuild/ by David Saphier)

Duefectu's bank switching method (http://www.duefectucorp.com/)

Shiru's BeepFX engine and sounds (https://shiru.untergrund.net/software.shtml)

Game coded by Oscar BraindeaD in october 2020
